availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Frankfort, Franklin County, Kentucky, physician. Kentucky native. Son of Mary B. Mills. Married to Keturah H. Weisiger in Franklin County, Kentucky, on December 23, 1852. Father of Jane W. Mills. Physician in Franklin County in 1850. Physician in Frankfort in 1860. Served as an Inspector of the Kentucky State Penitentiary in Frankfort, Franklin County, Kentucky, in 1865. Member of the Independent Order of Odd Fellows. Served as the Grand Master of the State of Kentucky Lodge of the Independent Order of Odd Fellows from July 18, 1855 to July 14, 1856.
